title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, delete, copy operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with fuzzy-find model selection.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama (inline suggestions, chat panel).

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that streams responses from any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CUDA, ROCm, CPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers, and MAUI sample.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-cog
summary: Cog container wrapping Ollama for easy model serving on Replicate cloud.

title: ollama-models
summary: Registry of community-contributed Modelfile recipes (Llama-3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama for embeddings + generation and Chroma as vector store.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with per-guild config.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama LLMs into channels/threads with streaming replies.
